level.text: The Chairperson shall sign or designate a person to sign the following:
All notices to Commissioners of regular and special meetings, except for special meetings called by a majority of the Commissioners or by the Mayor, as provided in ยง 302.2;
All notices and correspondence signifying proposed and final actions of the Commission;
All appointments of committees, hearing tribunals, and panels where such appointments are within the powers of the Chairperson; and
All letters drafted by the Secretary in accordance with ยง 300.4(d).
